## UserWalletEvents interface

[UserWallet](./sdk.userwallet.md) events that you can subscribe to using `sdk.wallet.events`.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface UserWalletEvents
```

## Properties

| Property                                               | Modifiers | Type             | Description                                                  |
| ------------------------------------------------------ | --------- | ---------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------ |
| [connected](./sdk.userwalletevents.connected.md)       |           | \[WalletSigner\] | Emitted when <code>sdk.wallet.connect()</code> is called.    |
| [disconnected](./sdk.userwalletevents.disconnected.md) |           | void             | Emitted when <code>sdk.wallet.disconnect()</code> is called. |
